Flawless Maneuver.name: Flawless Maneuver
Flawless Maneuver.flavor: Above the din and chaos of battle, your mind focuses with absolute clarity as you spot the perfect moment for your next attack.
Flawless Maneuver.effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to your next attack roll. If that roll is a natural 1, the attack doesnâ€™t automatically miss.
